Title: Morbidex Twiceborn
Legend: Morbidex Twiceborn is the champion of the Nurglings and has gained much of their unnatural resilience. In battle, swarms of the impish daemons trail after their living idol, drowning enemies in a filthy living tide.
Intro: Morbidex Twiceborn is armed with a Fleshreaper Scythe.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Contagium Overlord

Rules.Name: Mount
Rules.Rule: MOUNT: 'This unit’s Pox Maggoth, Tripletongue, is armed with Slabrous Tongues and Monstrous Claws.

Rules.Name: Gigantic Nurgling-Kin
Rules.Fluff: Twisted by the cruel attentions of manifold Nurglings, Morbidex has come to resemble them physically and has gained much of their unnatural resilience.
Rules.Rule: Gigantic Nurgling-kin: At the end of the battleshock phase, heal half of the wounds that have been allocated to this unit (rounding up).

Rules.Name: Lord Of Nurglings
Rules.Fluff: Morbidex Twiceborn is the chosen mortal champion of the Nurglings, who follow him into battle with boundless enthusiasm.
Rules.Rule: Lord of Nurglings: At the start of your hero phase, you can return 1 slain model to 1 friendly NURGLING SWARM within 7" of this unit.
